sn22.8:4.5: Idha, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano rūpaṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.8:4.6: Tassa taṃ rūpaṃ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti.
